name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground Beef, Tomato Sauce, Onion, Garlic, Olive Oil, Basil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti and top with Bolognese sauce.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh and crispy salad with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing.
ingredients: Lettuce, Chicken Breast, Croutons, Parmesan Cheese, Caesar Dressing
instructions: 1. Grill chicken 2.Toss with lettuce and dressing 3.Top with croutons.

name: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce.
ingredients: Bell Peppers, Carrots, Broccoli, Onion, Garlic, Soy Sauce, Olive Oil
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and soy sauce until tender.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies with lots of chocolate chips.
ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Butter, Chocolate Chips, Eggs, Baking Soda, Salt
instructions: Mix ingredients, form dough, bake at 350Â°F for 10 minutes.
